name: Super Galaxy Game
description:
I am a Student of video game programming.

The adventure of super galaxy game is from platform to pixel, Play as a single player, The character to complete all the levels in search of defeating the octopuses and also other enemies and when the Golem boss arrives.

Video Game play instructions :

The player to move select keyboard button A left and D right

Jump with Space Bar

Double jump double click on the Space Bar

Shooter the mouse left button

Take the Power Up use double jump.
